abstract: Boxer Manny Pacquiao announces plans for April 2016 bout in Las Vegas against Timothy Bradley.
lead_paragraph: Manny Pacquiao will return to the ring for a possible swan song on April 9 in Las Vegas against Timothy Bradley.

headline.main: Manny Pacquiao to Fight Bradley in April
headline.print_headline: Pacquiao to Fight Bradley in April

snippet: Manny Pacquiao will return to the ring for a possible swan song on April 9 in Las Vegas against Timothy Bradley.
